rooms.description: Spacious entrance with a reception area that leads to the living and dining zones. The space is designed to follow Vastu principles for proper energy flow, ensuring auspicious entry.

Large open-plan living room integrated with the kitchen and dining area, featuring sustainable materials and natural light enhancements. Windows on the south-east wall for positive energy according to Vastu.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen that connects seamlessly with the living area; utilizes energy-efficient appliances and sustainable cabinetry.
Integrated dining space within the open plan layout, offering natural lighting from south-west windows as per Vastu recommendations.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Placed on the north-east side to harness positive energy and ensure privacy.
Well-lit bedroom designed with ample ventilation, positioned on the west to balance energy flow.
Comfortable bedroom with south-facing windows for optimal light. Vastu alignment ensures a calm atmosphere.
Additional bedroom designed for flexibility, located on the north side ensuring stability and balance in energy flow.
En-suite bathroom integrated with the master bedroom, featuring water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly materials.
Guest restroom provided for visitors, adhering to eco-design principles and Vastu norms of placement away from the entrance.

openings.description: Large entrance door with a welcoming design, aligned with Vastu guidelines for positive entry energy.
Bay window above the front door to enhance natural light and maintain connection with nature.
Multiple windows in the living area ensuring ample daylight and cross ventilation, positioned according to Vastu principles.
Energy-efficient kitchen windows that allow natural lighting and promote air circulation.
Balcony door providing access from the living room to an external patio, designed for ventilation and connection with nature.
